title: Ordering Pizza
desc: Practice ordering pizzas, choosing sizes, extra ingredients, and additional items.
prompt_en: You want to order pizzas from a restaurant. Specify the types, sizes, extra ingredients, and any additional items you want to add. Confirm the order and payment method.
prompt_zh: 你想從餐廳訂購披薩。請說明披薩種類、尺寸、額外配料及其他想加點的餐點。確認訂單及付款方式。
sample_questions: Can I order two medium pepperoni pizzas with extra cheese?
Do you have any vegetarian pizza options?
Can I add olives and mushrooms to my tuna pizza?
How much is the total for two medium pizzas and a portion of chips?
Can I pay by card or only cash?

title: Ordering Drinks and Food at a Restaurant
desc: Practice ordering drinks and main dishes, asking for recommendations, and sharing food.
prompt_en: You are at a restaurant and want to order drinks and food. Ask for recommendations, decide what to order, and confirm your choices.
prompt_zh: 你在餐廳想點飲料和主菜。請詢問推薦菜色，決定點什麼，並確認你的選擇。
sample_questions: What drinks do you have?
Can you recommend a popular dish?
What is in the Cops salad?
Can we share the grilled chicken sandwich and the salad?
How long will it take for our order to be served?

title: Haircut and Style Consultation
desc: Practice discussing haircut styles, length, color, and preferences with a hairdresser.
prompt_en: You are at a hair salon. Talk with your hairdresser about the style you want, how much to cut, and hair color options.
prompt_zh: 你在美髮沙龍。與美髮師討論你想要的髮型、剪多少長度及染髮顏色選擇。
sample_questions: I want a short, straight hairstyle. How much should I cut?
Can you suggest a trendy haircut for me?
I want to change my hair color to brown. Is that possible?
Is the water temperature okay for shampoo?
How long will the haircut take?

title: Barber Shop: Haircut and Shave
desc: Practice describing your usual haircut style and shave preferences at a barber shop.
prompt_en: You are at a barber shop. Describe your usual haircut style, how you part your hair, and your shaving preferences.
prompt_zh: 你在理髮店。描述你平常的髮型、分線方式及刮鬍子的喜好。
sample_questions: I usually keep my hair longer on top and short on the sides.
I part my hair to the right side.
I want a clean shave with no mustache.
Can you do a quick shampoo before the cut?
How much do I owe you for the haircut and shave?

title: Inquiring About Gym Membership
desc: Practice asking about gym membership fees, opening hours, personal trainers, and signing up.
prompt_en: You want to join a gym. Ask about membership fees, opening hours, personal trainers, and how to sign up.
prompt_zh: 你想加入健身房。詢問會員費用、營業時間、私人教練服務及如何申請。
sample_questions: How much is the monthly membership fee?
Do you offer discounts for annual payments?
What are your opening hours?
Do you have personal trainers available?
How do I apply for a gym membership?

title: Discussing Gym Workout Plan
desc: Practice talking about a workout plan including weights, aerobics, yoga, and nutrition advice.
prompt_en: Discuss your workout plan at the gym including weight lifting, aerobics classes, yoga stretches, and nutrition tips.
prompt_zh: 討論你的健身計畫，包括舉重、有氧課程、瑜伽伸展及營養建議。
sample_questions: What exercises will we do today?
How often should I come to the gym to build muscle?
Can you give me some nutrition advice for weight loss?
Will we run outside today?
How can I improve my workout routine?

title: Buying Flowers for an Anniversary
desc: Practice selecting flowers, discussing preferences, budget, and bouquet options for a special occasion.
prompt_en: You want to buy flowers for your wife’s anniversary. Discuss flower types, bouquet options, prices, and your budget.
prompt_zh: 你想為妻子的周年紀念買花。討論花的種類、花束選擇、價格及預算。
sample_questions: What flowers does your wife like?
Do you have any bouquets with roses and tulips?
How much is this bouquet with the vase?
Do you have something around $50?
Can you pack the flowers safely for transport?

title: Applying for a Library Card
desc: Practice applying for a library card, providing proof of residence, filling forms, and asking about library sections.
prompt_en: You want to apply for a library card. Provide proof of residence, fill out the application, and ask about library sections.
prompt_zh: 你想申請圖書館借書證。提供居住證明、填寫申請表，並詢問圖書館各區位置。
sample_questions: What documents do I need to apply for a library card?
Where is the fiction section located?
How many books can I check out at one time?
Is there a reading area in the library?
Can I use a computer to search for books?
